Paper.Title: ITSPOKE: An Intelligent Tutoring Spoken Dialogue System

Section.Paragraph: ITSPOKE is a spoken dialogue system that uses the Why2-Atlas text-based tutoring system as its back-end . A student rst types a natural language answer to a qualitative physics problem. ITSPOKE then engages the student in a spoken dialogue to provide feedback and correct misconceptions, and to elicit more complete explanations. We are using ITSPOKE to generate an empirically-based understanding of the rami cations of adding spoken language capabilities to text-based dialogue tutors.
